borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Erection of front and rear roof extensions including the formation of a hip to gable roof extension, involving an increase in the ridge height to match no. 16 Edith Road; erection of an extension to the side of the main building at lower ground, upper ground, first, second and third floor levels; erection of a rear extension at third floor level, over part of the existing back addition; erection of rear extensions at upper ground, first and second floor level; erection of a single storey rear extension at lower ground floor level; formation of external rear garden steps and associated landscaping; erection of a single storey outbuilding in the rear garden; excavation of part of the rear garden to form 2no. lightwells, in connection with the creation of a new basement level.
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
